text: The Last Hard Men is a 1976 American western movie directed by Andrew V. McLaglen and based on the 1971 novel Gundown by Brian Garfield. It stars Charlton Heston, James Coburn, Barbara Hershey, Jorge Rivero, Michael Parks, Larry Wilcox, Christopher Mitchum and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * Category:1970s Western (genre) movies Category:1976 movies Category:American Western (genre) movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Andrew V. McLaglen
title: The Last Hard Men
